name: eggd_picardqc_v1.2.0
title: eggd Picard QC v1.2.0
summary: Run Picard Tools suite for sequence QC: CollectMultipleMetrics, CollectHsMetrics and CollectRnaSeqMetrics

inputSpec.name: sorted_bam
inputSpec.label: Sorted Mappings
inputSpec.help: An input BAM file for deduplicating and/or Picard Tools QC suites

inputSpec.name: fasta_index
inputSpec.label: Reference FASTA index archive
inputSpec.help: A gzipped tarball containing the reference genome files genome.fa, genome.fa.fai and genome.dict.

inputSpec.name: bedfile
inputSpec.label: Bedfile used to calculate HS metrics
inputSpec.help: Choose manufacturer's bed file (for the enrichment kit) whose coordinates will be used to calculate the selection metrics.

inputSpec.name: ref_annot_refflat
inputSpec.label: Ref flat file
inputSpec.help: Ref flat file containing reference genes and transcript

inputSpec.name: run_CollectMultipleMetrics
inputSpec.label: Choose whether to run Picard CollectMultipleMetrics
inputSpec.help: Specifically, run CollectAlignmentSummaryMetrics, CollectInsertSizeMetrics, QualityScoreDistribution, MeanQualityByCycle, CollectBaseDistributionByCycle, CollectGcBiasMetrics, CollectQualityYieldMetrics. See https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us/articles/360037594031-CollectMultipleMetrics-Picard-

inputSpec.name: run_CollectHsMetrics
inputSpec.label: Choose whether to run Picard CollectHsMetrics
inputSpec.help: Collects hybrid-selection (HS) metrics for a SAM or BAM file. https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us/articles/360037591891-CollectHsMetrics-Picard-

inputSpec.name: run_CollectTargetedPcrMetrics
inputSpec.label: Choose whether to run Picard CollectTargetedPcrMetrics
inputSpec.help: Calculate PCR-related metrics from targeted sequencing data. https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us/articles/360037225812-CollectTargetedPcrMetrics-Picard-

inputSpec.name: run_CollectRnaSeqMetrics
inputSpec.label: Choose whether to run Picard CollectRnaSeqMetrics
inputSpec.help: Calculate RNAseq metrics from targeted sequencing data. https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us/articles/360037225812-CollectTargetedPcrMetrics-Picard-
